citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials (Kendall Lundy, ACI and Dr. Margaret Shaver,
VMO) during the inspection process at 10:15AM on 02/22/2016.
Additional Inspectors
